prompt_elements.style_description: in the style of Moebius and European graphic novels, with clean confident contours, cinematic staging, and atmospheric color
prompt_elements.linework: confident continuous contours with selective line breaks, 2-4 line weights, heavier outer contours for figures, thinner for backgrounds
prompt_elements.color: mid-tone wash base, limited palette of 6-12 colors, atmospheric perspective with cooler distant elements, watercolor/gouache feel with paper grain
prompt_elements.composition: cinematic blocking with strong foreground shapes, negative space for breathing room, single primary light direction per panel
prompt_elements.technique: finished painting surfaces without losing line clarity, elegant slightly elongated proportions, expressive hands

prompt_elements.style_description: in watercolor impressionist comic style like Jillian Tamaki or Ghibli backgrounds, with loose intentional lines and emotional color washes
prompt_elements.linework: very light pencil-like lines that disappear into paint, or thin delicate incomplete ink lines, gesture-first drawing
prompt_elements.color: wet-on-wet watercolor blooms, emotional palette per panel, local color looseness (skin can be lavender, shadows can be teal), saturated accents for story beats
prompt_elements.composition: generous margins, soft backgrounds, paper as environment, lost-and-found edges dissolving into washes
prompt_elements.technique: watercolor behaviors - blooms, granulation, dry-brush texture, controlled backruns, big value groupings not careful shading

prompt_elements.style_description: in neo-baroque chiaroscuro style inspired by Rembrandt and Gustave Doré, with strong dramatic lighting and sculptural forms
prompt_elements.linework: line as structure not decoration, defining major plane breaks, optional subtle crosshatch or etched grain in midtones
prompt_elements.color: single-source spotlight lighting, true blacks and near-white highlights, subsurface warmth in lit skin with cooler shadows
prompt_elements.composition: triangular classical compositions, figures in pyramids, dark soft minimal backgrounds, focus on faces and hands
prompt_elements.technique: chiaroscuro blocking with shadow masses first then carve light, rim light for silhouette separation, old master gravity

prompt_elements.style_description: in expressionist ink and brush style like Ralph Steadman or Egon Schiele, with bold strokes, controlled distortion, and psychological energy
prompt_elements.linework: brush-first thinking with variable stroke width, economy of strokes (5-15 decisive strokes per figure), intentional distortion
prompt_elements.color: minimal color - one accent hue or 2-3 washes maximum, color as rough stains that ignore edges slightly
prompt_elements.composition: asymmetry, off-center subjects, tilted horizons, uneven margins, gesture and stroke direction communicating emotion
prompt_elements.technique: dry brush scratch texture, ink wash pools that bleed, controlled splatter in designated zones, negative space as active shape

prompt_elements.style_description: in minimalist conceptual comic style like Tom Gauld, with sparse lines, simple geometric shapes, and high clarity
prompt_elements.linework: uniform stroke weight throughout, geometric reduction of characters to circles/ovals/rectangles, simplified hands
prompt_elements.color: 1-3 flat colors plus black line maximum, no gradients, color as categorization or mood cue
prompt_elements.composition: white space as environment, strict grid alignment, consistent baseline height, minimal props to establish location
prompt_elements.technique: icon library approach with repeatable symbols, text-first layout, style sheet consistency across all panels

prompt_elements.style_description: in Art-Deco and Art-Nouveau fusion style like Mucha and Klimt, with ornamental borders, stylized silhouettes, and decorative patterns
prompt_elements.linework: two-mode line system - clean confident figure outlines with thinner intricate ornamental lines, vines halos sunbursts fan patterns
prompt_elements.color: flat colors with metallic gold accents, jewel tones (emerald sapphire garnet) with cream and black, pattern fills in clothing/backgrounds
prompt_elements.composition: decorative framing that echoes panel ideas, symmetry and centered figures, borders as integral design elements
prompt_elements.technique: Nouveau flowing S-curves for hair/fabric, Deco stepped geometry and radiating arcs, poster clarity with clean edges

prompt_elements.style_description: in woodcut engraving style inspired by Dürer and Lynd Ward, with carved line texture, high contrast, and directional hatching
prompt_elements.linework: carving logic where every mark feels cut with a gouge, tapered cuts with consistent directionality, hatching direction per plane
prompt_elements.color: black and white primarily, line spacing controls value (sparse for light, dense for midtones, solid black with white cuts for darks)
prompt_elements.composition: bold staging with simple compositions, big shapes and clear depth layers, stylized line patterns for sky/foliage/water
prompt_elements.technique: strong readable silhouettes first, spot blacks to anchor composition, paper grain texture, slight ink unevenness for printed feel
